Package nl.han.ica.oopg.view

Class FollowingViewport

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.view.Viewport
nl.han.ica.oopg.view.FollowingViewport
Direct Known Subclasses:
CenterFollowingViewport, EdgeFollowingViewport
public abstract class FollowingViewport
extends Viewport
Extend this class if you want to make your own following viewport implementation.

  • Constructor Details

    • FollowingViewport

      public FollowingViewport​(GameObject followedObject, int zoomWidth, int zoomHeight)
      Create a new FollowingViewport.
      Parameters:
      followedObject - The GameObject the Viewport is following.
      zoomWidth - The width in pixels which the viewPort will cut out of the world.
      zoomHeight - The height in pixels which the viewPort will cut out of the world.

  • Method Details

    • getFollowedObject

      public GameObject getFollowedObject()
      Gets the following GameObject.
      Returns:
      GameObject the Viewport is following.

    • setFollowedObject

      public void setFollowedObject​(GameObject followedObject)
      Sets the following GameObject.
      Parameters:
      followedObject - The GameObject the Viewport is following.

    • setTolerance

      public void setTolerance​(int top, int bottom, int left, int right)
      Sets the tolerance of the edge to move the Viewport.
      Parameters:
      top - The tolerance op the top side the object has to move before the Viewport moves with it.
      bottom - The tolerance op the bottom side the object has to move before the Viewport moves with it.
      left - The tolerance op the left side the object has to move before the Viewport moves with it.
      right - The tolerance op the right side the object has to move before the Viewport moves with it.

    • getTopTolerance

      Gets the top tolerance.
      Returns:
      The tolerance op the top side the object has to move before the viewport moves with it.
